messages.customerMessage: Hi, I need help with my order
messages.botResponse: Hi Jonathan! I'll be happy to help you with your order #2168 from yesterday. Could you let me know what specific assistance you need with your test product? I'm here to help!

Hi Jonathan! Your order #2168 is still processing since it was just placed yesterday. I'll check the shipping timeline for your test product - just give me a moment. While I don't have exact shipping dates in front of me, most orders ship within 1-2 business days. I'll be happy to look into more specific details if you need them!
